bibl.title: Three New Papyri from the Roca-Puig Collection at the Abbey of Montserrat: A Homer Fragment and Two Tax Receipts. Avec résumé en anglais.
Festschrift für Günter Poethke zum 70. Geburtstag (P. Poethke)
bibl.author: TORALLAS TOVAR, Sofía

bibl.note: 37. A Fragment of Homer's Iliad XIV. Provenance unknown, IIIp. - 38-39. Two Tax Receipts from Early Arabic Egypt. Hermoupolis, VII/VIIIp.
TORALLAS TOVAR Sofía and Klaas A. WORP, Three New Papyri from the Roca-Puig Collection at the Abbey of Montserrat: A Homer Fragment and Two Tax Receipts. Avec résumé en anglais.
Festschrift für Günter Poethke zum 70. Geburtstag (P. Poethke) = ArchPF 55 (2009) pp. 470-477, Nos 37-39 et pll. XXXI-XXXIV.
141.4 P. Monts. Roca Inv. 199 = P. Poethke 38; Inv. 498 = P. Poethke 39; Inv. 541 A-B = P. Poethke 37
